mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mlogin(mloginno, managerno, ip, logindate) VALUES (mlogin_seq.nextval, #{managerno}, #{ip}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT mloginno, managerno, ip, logindate FROM mlogin ORDER BY mloginno DESC
SELECT mloginno, managerno, ip, logindate FROM mlogin WHERE managerno=#{managerno} ORDER BY logindate DESC
